text:
When a Trait which is an Integer is requested on a area using 
Area.getTraitAsInteger an exception is thrown if that trait just happens not 
to be present for the block in question. Instead of throwing an exception the 
method should check for Null and return 0.

I have attached a patch for this
creator: bowditch_chris@hotmail.com

text:
As discussed here,

http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?l=fop-dev&m=106881824816841&w=2

we'll hold off on this one and make it a trait-by-trait decision instead--in 
case there are some traits in which "NULL" (unspecified) would call for 
different results than a zero.
